title: Tortilla Maria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little organic Mexican food restaurant offering some vegan, raw, and gluten-free dishes. Tortillas, hot sauce, and spicy guacamole are made-in-house. Uses organic local veggies. Vegan choices include soup, Maria's wild rice, and Maria's salad. Also serves organic smoothies made-in-house filled with berries, greens, bananas, fresh juices, soy milk. Order at counter.
